text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you!  I respect your decision not to wear a mask, however, no shoe, no shirt, no mask. . . No service! 😷 Frequent those establishments that do not care about others.  #coronavirus #Coronavirusmask #WearAMaskSaveAlife
